subject: style(charts): increase timeline iframe height for multi-repo legend
body:
The activity timeline has a legend entry per repo. With 12+ repos the
legend wraps and eats into chart space at the default h-80/h-96 size.
Bumped to h-96 (384px) mobile / h-[28rem] (448px) desktop to avoid
internal scrolling.

Tags: charts, layout
Complexity: 1
Urgency: 2
Impact: user-facing
Risk: low
Debt: neutral
Epic: cv-layout
Semver: patch

https://claude.ai/code/session_01BAdMnozqT352jPPZqjFxzU
title: increase timeline iframe height for multi-repo legend
